description.value: Whenever you try to perform engineering or science tasks, everything just seems to explode. Whenever you attempt to create or use an alchemical item or a construct, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Disable a Device], and so on, you must attempt a @Check[flat|dc:15]. On a failure, something explodes and you take @Damage[1d6[fire]] damage (or a different type of damage, if appropriate) per level of the item, construct, or device (@Check[reflex|dc:40|basic] save).
